verses.verse: <S%G4012><s%> But Concerning <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Times <S%G5550><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seasons, <S%G2540><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> For You <S%G5213><s%> To Be Written To, <S%G1125><s%>

<S%G846><s%> For Yourselves <S%G1063><s%> Accurately <S%G199><s%> Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Thief <S%G2812><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Comes. <S%G2064><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> For When <S%G1063><s%> They May Say, <S%G3004><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Security, <S%G803><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Sudden <S%G160><s%> Upon Them <S%G846><s%> Comes <S%G2186><s%> Destruction, <S%G3639><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Travail <S%G5604><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> To Her That Is With Child; <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall They Escape. <S%G1628><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> But Ye, <S%G1161><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not <S%G2075><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Darkness, <S%G4655><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Thief <S%G2812><s%> Should Overtake : <S%G2638><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Light <S%G5457><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Day; <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Are Not <S%G2070><s%> Of Night <S%G3571><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Of Darkness. <S%G4655><s%>

So <S%G686><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3361><s%> We Should Not Sleep <S%G2518><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest, <S%G3062><s%> But <S%G235><s%> We Should Watch <S%G1127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Should Be Sober; <S%G3525><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For They That <S%G1063><s%> Sleep <S%G2518><s%> By Night <S%G3571><s%> Sleep, <S%G2518><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They That <S%G3588><s%> Are Drunken <S%G3182><s%> By Night <S%G3571><s%> Get Drunk; <S%G3184><s%>

<S%G2249><s%> But We <S%G1161><s%> Of Day <S%G2250><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Should Be Sober, <S%G3525><s%> Having Put On The <S%G1746><s%> Breastplate <S%G2382><s%> Of Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Love, <S%G26><s%> And As <S%G2532><s%> Helmet <S%G4030><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> Salvation's; <S%G4991><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Has Set <S%G5087><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Obtaining <S%G4047><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> We May Watch <S%G1127><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> We May Sleep, <S%G2518><s%> Together <S%G260><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> We May Live. <S%G2198><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Encourage <S%G3870><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Build Up <S%G3618><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other, <S%G1520><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye Are Doing. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G2065><s%> But We Beseech <S%G1161><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> To Know <S%G1492><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Labour <S%G2872><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Take The Lead <S%G4291><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Admonish <S%G3560><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To Esteem <S%G2233><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G5228><s%> Exceedingly <S%G4057><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Their Work. <S%G846><s%> Be At Peace <S%G1514><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>

<S%G3870><s%> But We Exhort <S%G1161><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Admonish <S%G3560><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disorderly, <S%G813><s%> Console <S%G3888><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faint Hearted, <S%G3642><s%> Sustain <S%G472><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Weak, <S%G772><s%> Be Patient <S%G3114><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%>

See That <S%G3708><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> For <S%G473><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> To Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Render, <S%G591><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Pursue <S%G1377><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> All; <S%G3956><s%>
Always <S%G3842><s%> Rejoice; <S%G5463><s%>
Unceasingly <S%G89><s%> Pray; <S%G4336><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> Give Thanks, <S%G2168><s%> <S%G5124><s%> For This Is The <S%G1063><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> You; <S%G5209><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Quench; <S%G4570><s%>
Prophecies <S%G4394><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Set At Naught; <S%G1848><s%>
All Things <S%G3956><s%> Prove, <S%G1381><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Right <S%G2570><s%> Hold Fast; <S%G2722><s%>
From <S%G575><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Form <S%G1491><s%> Of Wickedness <S%G4190><s%> Abstain. <S%G567><s%>

<S%G846><s%> Now Himself <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Peace <S%G1515><s%> May Sanctify <S%G37><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Wholly; <S%G3651><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Entire <S%G3648><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Blameless <S%G274><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> May Be Preserved. <S%G5083><s%>
He Is Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Calls <S%G2564><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Will Perform It, <S%G4160><s%>
Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Pray <S%G4336><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Us. <S%G2257><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Kiss <S%G5370><s%> Holy. <S%G40><s%>

I Adjure <S%G3726><s%> You By <S%G5209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord That <S%G2962><s%> Be Read <S%G314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Epistle <S%G1992><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ Be <S%G5547><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To The <S%G4314><s%> Thessalonians <S%G2331><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Athens. <S%G116><s%>
